channel.title: Please Help Me! Please! (562)
channel.description:
I'm using Runeslayer which is a 562 revision server, and I really need some help.
Okay when I have the ip 127.0.0.1 in client.java client sided it will connect for me, but when I put my no-ip it doesnt work.
I changed all the ip's (2) client sided to my ip, and I .rared it and uploaded it. My friends tried to play but it didnt work.
Exactly what folders do I have to modify in Client ? And do I have to change anything in Source? Please guys, I have been doing this 7 hours straight, and I'm tired, I really just want this server online.. Please..

item.title: Please Help Me! Please! (562)
item.dc:creator: @Keatrm Keatrm
item.description:
@Keatrm wrote:

I’m using Runeslayer which is a 562 revision server, and I really need some help.

Okay when I have the ip 127.0.0.1 in client.java client sided it will connect for me, but when I put my no-ip it doesnt work.

I changed all the ip’s (2) client sided to my ip, and I .rared it and uploaded it. My friends tried to play but it didnt work.

Exactly what folders do I have to modify in Client ? And do I have to change anything in Source?
Please guys, I have been doing this 7 hours straight, and I’m tired, I really just want this server online… Please…
